content: I'm afraid I can't say much to that, for now at least.
Hmmm, I will say something to that an other time.
Hmmm, say or ask something else. Then, I might say something more.
I don't really know what to say to that.
It seems you said something to which I cannot say anything.
Say something else, please. What you said just confuses me.
I'm sorry, but what you said confused me.
I'm afraid I don't understand you.
I'll say something to that an other time.
English isn't my first language, and so I don't get what you mean.
Ask something else. We can get back to that an other time.
I... I don't know what to say to that.
I will keep my answer to that for myself for now. I might reveal it an other time for you.
I won't say my answer to that for now. I'll keep it for myself. You may ask something else.
Ask something else. I can't give an answer to that now.
Um, well, I... I'll answer it an other time. Ask something else.
I'll need some time to think on what to say to that. Meanwhile, you may ask something else.
I will answer it an other time. This is not the right time for you to hear my answer to it.
It is rather difficult for me to say something relevant to that.
So... wait, no. I'll tell you this an other time. This isn't the right time for it.
Well wha-, wait. I'll get back to you with this once I feel like it. But now.
I feel like my answer to that will have to wait a bit.
Alright. I said what you wanted me to say.
And... done. There you go. I said your message.
I said your message, just as you wanted.
Okay. Message delivered!
All done. I hope you're happy, friend.
I said it. I hope it pleases you!
Message said. All done.
I'm sorry, but I don't know you well enough to just say something like that to someone as if you were me.
I don't trust you enough to do this for you. I need some time first to trust you.
I won't just say something like I were you. I need to trust you first more.
Before I do such a think, I need to know you better.
I can say something to others. Not now at least. I need to know you more.
I'm sorry, but can't do what you requested. I'm afraid it is beyond my reach.
I'm afraid I can't do that. It is beyond my reach.
I tried to do what you wanted, but I can't. I cannot do everything
